title: I Quit League
body: Jokes on you losers, have fun wasting 30 minutes a game in botted aram and toxic soloq

replies.body:
it takes you 30 mins to beat bots in ARAM?
{{sticker:slayer-jinx-wink}}
Everyone that said they were leaving 99% of them came back. Why this Summoner said 'See you next Tuesday' though I'm not sure.

> [{quoted}](name=Zahe Jr,realm=OCE,application-id=Ntey9fRZ,discussion-id=4XAlrbho,comment-id=000400000000,timestamp=2016-02-12T22:36:31.960+0000)
>
> Everyone that said they were leaving 99% of them came back. Why this Summoner said 'See you next Tuesday' though I'm not sure.

Because he's much more likely to return to League in a very short amount of time and Tuesday is just generic.

> [{quoted}](name=Lord Kylar Alice,realm=OCE,application-id=Ntey9fRZ,discussion-id=4XAlrbho,comment-id=0004000000000000,timestamp=2016-02-13T00:45:53.762+0000)
>
> Because he's much more likely to return to League in a very short amount of time and Tuesday is just generic.

> [{quoted}](name=Danklight Vayne,realm=OCE,application-id=Ntey9fRZ,discussion-id=4XAlrbho,comment-id=00040000,timestamp=2016-02-12T06:37:39.315+0000)
>
> **_c_** **_u_** **_n_**ext **_t_**uesday?

*cough*
wow, finding the bat parts in everything

But then i gotta remove you -.- too much effort

fyi already been a month and 6 days since you played. does it mean i gotta remove you now ?-.-
Goodbye friend, may the League-less world treat you better.

no one cares tbh.
and we'll see you next week anyway
